EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for using LegalZoom. You will find a copy of your Provisional Application for Patent attached to this email. Please look over the application thoroughly to ensure that all of the provided information is correct. Once filed, changes cannot be made.
1. If no changes are needed, simply reply to this e-mail with instructions to continue filing as is. 2. If changes are required, please make changes TO THE ATTACHED DOCUMENT*, save it to your computer, and email us the revised document as an attachment with instructions to "apply the changes as attached."
(*Note: The "Abstract" field is limited to 150 words. Details should be listed within the "Description" section.)
Although illustrations are not required with your Provisional Application for Patent, it is highly recommended that you include them. Illustrations, including rough sketches or photographs, serve as a visual explanation of how different components come together to produce the finished product. If you would like to add illustrations to your application, please attach them to your reply email and indicate that you wish to include them with your filing.
If no response is received within 15 days, we will continue with the filing of your Provisional Application for Patent with the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO). If more time is needed, simply let us know and we will put your order on hold.
Please feel free to contact our {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} if we can be of further assistance. Simply reply to this email, or call us toll free at {!snippetVariable.ccphone}. Our {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} business hours are {!snippetVariable.cchours}.
Thank you again for choosing LegalZoom.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team
